schema:description: From the film's advertising brochure: This film tells of water problems that threaten California's three-fold future growth in population, agriculture, and industry today and tomorrow; shows how the Feather River Project can provide a better life for all Californians; suggests what you, your organization, and all Californians can do to speed construction of the Feather River Project and other needed water development.
schema:name: California Waterama: The Story of the Feather River Project
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
